steps.text: In a heavy bottom pot, add the juice and sugar over low heat.
Bring to a simmer for a few minutes until sugar is dissolved (don't stir, just swirl the pot)
Add cherries and continue to simmer slowly for about 45 minutes, turning now and then
They will start to wrinkle and look like candied cherries
At the 45 minute mark, use a candy thermometer to check the liquid. It should reach the soft ball stage (about 237Â°F)
Remove from heat and place cherries on a tray (silicon mat works well)
Store in the fridge in a seal container, they should keep up to 6 months if candied properly
